asmt_metric.name: New String
asmt_metric.question: Thank you for the great rating! Do you have any recommendations on how I could further improve my service?
asmt_metric.script: // The following variables are available: // - primary: contains the sys_id of the assessable object to be evaluated // - string_result: the script sets the display string value for this metric to this variable // - actual_result: the script sets the actual value for this metric to this variable // - scaled_result: the script sets the scaled value (used in calculations) for this metric to this variable // // For example: // var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci'); // gr.addQuery('manufacturer', primary); // gr.query(); // actual_result = gr.getRowCount(); // string_result = actual_result + ''; // if (actual_result > 100) scaled_result = 5; // else scaled_result = 1;

Do you have any recommendations on how I could further improve my service?</question><randomize_answers>false</randomize_answers><read_only>false</read_only><reference_table/><scale>low</scale><scored>false</scored><script><![CDATA[// The following variables are available: // - primary: contains the sys_id of the assessable object to be evaluated // - string_result: the script sets the display string value for this metric to this variable // - actual_result: the script sets the actual value for this metric to this variable // - scaled_result: the script sets the scaled value (used in calculations) for this metric to this variable // // For example: // var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci'); // gr.addQuery('manufacturer', primary); // gr.query(); // actual_result = gr.getRowCount(); // string_result = actual_result + ''; // if (actual_result > 100) scaled_result = 5; // else scaled_result = 1;]]></script><source_field/><string_option>wide</string_option><sys_class_name>asmt_metric</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>AB019AM</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-10 12:59:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b46321d28710c510c386fd99cebb35ab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>New String</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Absa HR NLU Models" source="x_absa2_absa_hr_nl">4a28375b1bedec54ef5b635ee54bcba5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Absa HR NLU Models">4a28375b1bedec54ef5b635ee54bcba5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>asmt_metric_b46321d28710c510c386fd99cebb35ab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>AB019AM</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-10 12:59:20</sys_updated_on><template/><weight>10</weight></asmt_metric></record_update>
